backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with user, store, product, order, review, and terms data structures plus authorization mixins and helper role-checking functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing APK delivery requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for each component or utility.
frontend/.gitattributes: Configures Git attributes to treat APKs and other binaries correctly and enforce LF endings for meta JSON files.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build outputs, IDE files, keystores, and generated asset directories.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle config for the Android app, including SDK settings, dependencies, build types, and a task to copy web assets into the app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Defines app permissions, main activity, launcher intent, and deep link handling for auth return.
frontend/android/app/src/main/assets/www: Empty placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is tracked in Git.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/p: Android WebView host activity loading the web app, handling deep links, and routing auth flows through external custom tabs.
Utility class determining when to open URLs externally and managing return-to-app deep links via custom tabs.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Defines a splash screen layer-list with a white background and centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout containing a full-screen WebView widget.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Adaptive round launcher icon definition mirroring the standard icon assets.
Adaptive launcher icon definition with white background and foreground asset.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Declares the application's string resources, including app name.
Defines the app theme using a splash screen background and no action bar.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build configuration setting up plugin versions, repositories, and a clean task.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle properties configuring JVM args, AndroidX usage, and Kotlin style.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Specifies the Gradle wrapper distribution URL and storage paths.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Configures plugin repositories, dependency resolution, and includes the app module.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Documentation outlining steps for building, staging, validating, and deploying the Android APK.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file reserved for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/public/_headers: Defines correct content types and caching for APK and metadata files.
frontend/public/_redirects: Ensures APK and metadata are served directly and enables SPA fallback for other routes.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk-debug: PowerShell script that builds the web app, compiles a debug Android APK, validates it, and publishes it to public assets.
Shell script that builds the web app, generates a debug APK, validates it, and copies it to public assets with metadata.
frontend/scripts/predeploy-stage-apk-ass: Wrapper script that runs platform-appropriate APK staging and blocks deployment if validation fails.
frontend/scripts/stage-android-apk-asset: PowerShell script validating or copying the debug APK to public assets and generating matching metadata.
Shell script ensuring the APK exists, is valid, copied to public assets, and accompanied by correct metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing and layout logic, handling authentication state, dialogs, and role-based pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: UI panel for admins to view, edit, and publish legal documents including customer terms, store owner terms, and privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with options to log in as admin, return home, or sign out when a user lacks required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Dialog allowing users to enable biometric authentication, handling setup, cancellation, and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/FactoryRese: Confirmation dialog for performing a factory reset that deletes all application data after typing a required phrase.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Dialog for setting and confirming a 4‑digit PIN, validating input and saving it locally.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for collecting user profile details, role selection, and terms acceptance, with special handling for super admin bootstrapping.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Unlock dialog using biometrics or PIN, handling errors, retries, and UI state transitions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation links based on user role, language selection, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Provides theme context, persists theme preference, and resolves system vs user-selected mode.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button to toggle between light and dark themes using ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
Handles Android WebView login flow detection, wrapping Internet Identity login with Android-specific error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Manages WebAuthn-based biometric enablement and verification with local credential storage and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Manages PIN hashing, storage, verification, and unlock state using local/session storage and a reactive store.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, admin bootstrap state, terms content, and factory reset via backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Provides language context, persistent language selection, and a translation lookup function for English and French.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/en.ts: Contains the full set of English UI translation strings for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/fr.ts: Contains the full set of French UI translation strings for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining base styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Exports static legal text strings for customer and store owner terms formatted for display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
Admin dashboard showing stats, store management, and analytics aggregated daily, weekly, or monthly.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings page providing access to manage terms and policies using the TermsManagementPanel.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Handles role‑based login, admin bootstrap flows, Android bridge auth, and factory reset logic with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items per store with quantity updates, removal, totals, and navigation to checkout or store pages.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Checkout flow handling order submission, payment method selection, PIN/biometric auth, and cart clearing.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Customer dashboard offering navigation shortcuts to store access, search, marketplace, cart, and orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSett: Customer settings page for viewing and updating profile details with validation and save mutations.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Marketplace with product search, category filtering, sorting, and add-to-cart logic using store and product queries.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays detailed info for a specific order, including items, status, store info, and navigation back to orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists active and completed orders with status badges and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Simple form allowing users to enter a store ID and navigate to that store’s page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Shows store details, reviews, and products with add-to-cart functionality and availability checks.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Store search interface with name and category filters and navigation to selected store pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Manages store inventory, allowing owners to create, edit, and delete products with form handling, image upload, and stock tracking.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Displays store orders grouped by status and lets owners update order progress through simple action buttons.
Shows the owner's stores with quick navigation to inventory, orders, and settings, and provides store registration access.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerSettingsPa: Allows owners to view and update their profile information with validation and save operations.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Provides a form for creating a new store with fields for name, category, location, and mobile money number.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Enables editing an existing store’s details and saving updates, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/public/ApkDownloadPag: Displays APK download info, fetches metadata and validation results, and shows errors for invalid or missing APKs.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Fetches and displays the privacy policy content with a scrollable layout and fallback error alert.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Shows terms content from backend or fallback text, requires user acceptance, and records acceptance via mutation.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items per store with persistence, quantity updates, removals, and total calculations.
frontend/src/state/pinSessionStore.ts: In-memory PIN session store tracking pin-set and unlock state with subscription support.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides functions to aggregate orders into daily, weekly, and monthly stats with revenue totals.
frontend/src/utils/apkIntegrity.ts: Fetches APK metadata and validates APK integrity by checking headers, content type, size, and possible errors.
frontend/src/utils/geolocation.ts: Utility functions for requesting geolocation, calculating distances, and parsing coordinate strings.
frontend/src/utils/logout.ts: Provides centralized logout and factory-reset cleanup functions that clear identity, caches, storage, and navigate home, plus utilities for tracking a logout epoch.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting prices and computing effective prices and line totals using bigint.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Generates display names and initials from a UserProfile object with simple fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: Provides WebAuthn availability checks and wrappers for creating and retrieving platform authenticator credentials with error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, layouts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing requirements, known issues, and APK deployment-related features.
